welcome_message_body: "Welcome to West Richland, a charming city known for its scenic beauty and welcoming community. We invite you to explore and enjoy our city, filled with unique experiences and friendly locals."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Richland Airport is a modern and efficient facility, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Richland Airport is equipped to handle a variety of freight and is conveniently located near major highways for easy transportation.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tri-cities Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tri-cities Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
